column2: A conscientious ruler, [Root.GetFirstName] was renown for [Root.GetHerHis] excellent skills as a steward and a ruler
Known as a great builder and imaginative planner, [Root.GetFirstName] will be remembered for [Root.GetHerHis] tireless attempts to renovate and expand [Root.Capital.GetName]
Because of the unfortunate circumstances of [Root.GetHerHis] birth, many doubted the legitimacy of [Root.GetFirstName]'s rule. [Root.GetSheHeCap] has now found peace from their slander in death

A wicked [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetSheHe] was rumored to speak to and entertain [Root.GetHerselfHimself] with beasts. [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] abominable sins in the afterlife
Rumored to consume human flesh for sustenance, [Root.GetFirstName] is without a doubt being punished in the afterlife for [Root.GetHerHis] wickedness in life
A revolutionary [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetSheHe] led [Root.GetHerHis] tribes away from the worship of old idols and into the glory of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith

Having been mangled in a terrible accident, [Root.GetFirstName] spent [Root.GetHerHis] last years barely able to walk. Death has finally freed [Root.GetHerHis] soul from [Root.GetHerHis] crippled body
A zealous [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetSheHe] fought for the glory of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] against the heathens in one of the greatest holy wars of recent history

Having been horribly disfigured, [Root.GetFirstName] spent [Root.GetHerHis] last years unable to show [Root.GetHerHis] face in public. Death has finally freed [Root.GetHerHis] soul from [Root.GetHerHis] crippled body

Known as an inveterate drunkard, [Root.GetFirstName] hardly ever spent a single day without drenching [Root.GetHerselfHimself] in liquor, barely aware of [Root.GetHerHis] surroundings. [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
Known to be a fierce fighter, [Root.GetFirstName] spent most of [Root.GetHerHis] days practicing for [Root.GetHerHis] next duel, always seeking new thrills

Born under unfortunate circumstances, [Root.GetFirstName] was often derided for [Root.GetHerHis] diminutive stature. [Root.GetHerHisCap] soul has finally been freed from [Root.GetHerHis] deformed body
Having died as an outcast, excommunicated from the Church, [Root.GetFirstName] is sure to face eternal damnation in the afterlife

Cursed with an unhealthy love for food, [Root.GetFirstName] was known for [Root.GetHerHis] massive girth. Many at court were fearing that [Root.GetHerHis] habits would lead [Root.GetHerHim] to an untimely demise for years before [Root.GetHerHis] death
Known as a competent strategist, [Root.GetFirstName] was often found envisioning new and complex games to impress [Root.GetHerHis] guests at court
Surely, [Root.GetSheHe] is now lending [Root.GetHerHis] skills to groom [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s garden itself
Born with unparalleled genius, [Root.GetFirstName] was known for [Root.GetHerHis] sharp and brilliant mind, always looking for new problems to solve and new opportunities to exploit

Born under unfortunate circumstances, [Root.GetFirstName] was often derided for [Root.GetHerHis] gigantic proportions. [Root.GetHerHisCap] soul has finally been freed from [Root.GetHerHis] deformed body

Known to be Gluttonous, [Root.GetSheHe] spent [Root.GetHerHis] days trying to sate [Root.GetHerHis] abominable appetite. A wicked [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife

Known for [Root.GetHerHis] wild feasts and dissolute conduct, [Root.GetSheHe] hardly ever gave any thought to spiritual matters. [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
Born under unfortunate circumstances, [Root.GetFirstName] was often derided for [Root.GetHerHis] twisted back. [Root.GetHerHisCap] soul has finally been freed from [Root.GetHerHis] deformed body
A skilled hunter, [Root.GetFirstName] filled [Root.GetHerHis] halls with exotic trophies gathered in [Root.GetHerHis] many expeditions in the wilderness

Known for [Root.GetHerHis] sadistic streak, [Root.GetFirstName] enjoyed torturing and mutilating [Root.GetHerHis] enemies. [Root.GetSheHe] will surely be punished for [Root.GetHerHis] inhuman crimes in the afterlife
Known to have stained [Root.GetHerHis] hands in the blood of [Root.GetHerHis] own kin, [Root.GetFirstName] is surely paying for [Root.GetHerHis] horrific crimes in the afterlife
A disturbed person, [Root.GetFirstName] was known throughout [Root.GetHerHis] lands as a raving [Root.GetMadwomanMadman]. Many are cautiously rejoicing at the news of [Root.GetHerHis] death

Barely eating anything, [Root.GetFirstName] was known for [Root.GetHerHis] weak constitution. Many at court were fearing that [Root.GetHerHis] habits would lead [Root.GetHerHim] to an untimely demise for years before [Root.GetHerHis] death

Known for spending most of [Root.GetHerHis] nights in [Root.GetHerHis] laboratory, [Root.GetFirstName] was believed by many to be nothing more than a warlock, concocting unholy spells in the secrecy of [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHouse]
Known as an inspired and insightful poet, [Root.GetFirstName] delighted many in [Root.GetHerHis] court with [Root.GetHerHis] moving verses
By restoring the Empire's ancient power, [Root.GetFirstName] has ensured that [Root.GetHerHis] name will live on in glory to the end of times
The sacred restorer of the Persian Empire, [Root.GetHerHis] rise to glory will be immortalized in the sermons of all Zoroastrian priests. Surely, [Root.GetSheHe] sits next to Ahura Mazda now
Rumored to have sold [Root.GetHerHis] soul to [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], [Root.GetFirstName] was always considered by many a troubled and mysterious [Root.GetManWoman]
Known for [Root.GetHerHis] twisted, conniving mind, [Root.GetFirstName] never revealed [Root.GetHerHis] true intentions to anybody, not even [Root.GetHerHis] closest friends
Known to be a respected scholar, [Root.GetFirstName] spent most of [Root.GetHerHis] days studying in [Root.GetHerHis] library, rarely leaving [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHouse]
Known as a libertine [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] was gifted with a silver tongue, able to charm anyone into sharing [Root.GetHerHis] bed
Known as a libertine [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] was gifted with a silver tongue, able to charm anyone into sharing [Root.GetHerHis] bed
Known to be a staunch opposer of the Papacy, [Root.GetFirstName] was notorious for claiming that [Root.GetHerHis] right to rule came directly from [Root.GetHighGodName]
A talkative person and a sensible host, [Root.GetFirstName] was renown across the realm for [Root.GetHerHis] welcoming and cheerful attitude
A pious [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetSheHe] spent many years and resources trying to spread the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] amongst the heathens
Known to be an exceptional strategist, [Root.GetFirstName] spent many of [Root.GetHerHis] days examining fields and drilling [Root.GetHerHis] troops

Known as a pious [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] spent many of [Root.GetHerHis] years studying the ancient scriptures and learning all that there is to know about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]

[Root.GetFirstName] was as a patron of architects, offering parts of his riches to build a better nation. [Root.GetHerHisCap] rule will surely be remembered by the people every time they see the fruits of [Root.GetHerHis] labor
While many struggle to see why [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] decided to take a young child away from us, we hope [Root.GetFirstName] will find peace in the afterlife

For [Root.GetHerHis] wicked deeds, many screamed not to bury [Root.GetFirstName] with the other rulers of our lands, instead to toss [Root.GetHerHim] in an unmarked grave and without the proper services. May [Root.GetFirstName] finally pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife

Never succeeding in making a name for [Root.GetHerselfHimself], [Root.GetFirstName] most notable deed was participating in the construction of the great works which [Root.GetSheHe] will never see finished
Well-known to be Charitable, [Root.GetSheHe] freely gave money to [Root.GetHerHis] friends and family. A godly [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
A Chaste [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetHerHis] honor was beyond refute. A godly [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
Although not especially blessed, we hope [Root.GetFirstName] will find peace in the afterlife
A shining example of Diligence, [Root.GetHerHis] duty was never neglected. A godly [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
Ever Envious, [Root.GetSheHe] always wanted what other people had. A wicked [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife

A Greedy [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetSheHe] often remarked on the need to tax [Root.GetHerHis] people into space. A wicked [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife

A humble [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetSheHe] never wanted anyone to make a fuss over [Root.GetHerHis] accomplishments. A godly [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now
Known to be Kind, few had a bad word to say about [Root.GetHerHim]. A godly [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now

Well-known to be prone to carnal sins, [Root.GetSheHe] was often unfaithful to [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHusbandWifeOpp]. A wicked [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
Although not especially blessed, we hope [Root.GetFirstName] will find peace in the afterlife
Always Patient, [Root.GetSheHe] never lost [Root.GetHerHis] temper. A godly [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now

Guilty of the sin of Pride, [Root.GetSheHe] wanted everyone to know of [Root.GetHerHis] greatness. A wicked [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
Prone to Sloth, [Root.GetSheHe] never did anything [Root.GetSheHe] did not have to. A wicked [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
Ever Temperate, [Root.GetSheHe] never let [Root.GetHerHis] base urges get the better of [Root.GetHerHim]. A godly [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now

A Wroth [Root.GetManWoman], people feared to cross [Root.GetHerHim] - or even bring bad news. A wicked [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName] will surely pay for [Root.GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
